article.Heading: Budget 2016 Caravan: Is MNREGA a failure in Bihar?
article.Summary: It's been a decade since the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act, or MNREGA, came into force. Budget 2016 is also widely expected to provide a further boost to such social welfare schemes.
article.Body:
It's been a decade since the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act, or MNREGA, came into force. Budget 2016 is also widely expected to provide a further boost to such social welfare schemes.

However, when CNBC-TV18'S Budget Caravan travelled through districts of Bihar, they found that implementation of these schemes at the grass-root level was not upto the desired levels.
